name: CTA Btn
description: Presents a single, clear suggestion with a prominent Call-to-Action (CTA) button. Use this when the primary goal is to encourage a specific user action (e.g., book, order, purchase, find directions), not just to display information. Not intended for media playback.
examples: Recommend a good place for lunch.
Find a birthday gift for my friend.
Book a table for two tonight.

component_title.description: A brief title for the card (e.g., 'Lunch Suggestion', 'Gift Idea').

text_sub_heading.description: Secondary text, providing context or details (e.g., 'Italian Cuisine', 'Free Delivery').

text_heading.description: The main text or title of the suggestion (e.g., 'Margherita Pizza', 'Flower Bouquet').

text_cta.description: The text for the Call-to-Action button (e.g., 'Order Now', 'View Options', 'Book a Table').
